columns.id: The unique identifier for each battle entry.
columns.name: The name of the battle.
columns.date: The date when the battle occurred.
columns.bulgarian_commander: The name of the Bulgarian commander leading the forces.
columns.latin_commander: The name of the Latin commander leading the forces.

battle.table_description: The table catalogs battles with details about commanders and outcomes.

columns.lost_in_battle: The battle identifier where the ship was lost.
columns.id: The unique identifier for each ship entry.
columns.name: The name of the ship.
columns.tonnage: The tonnage measurement of the ship.
columns.ship_type: The classification type of the ship.
columns.location: The geographical location where the ship was lost.
columns.disposition_of_ship: The status of the ship after the battle.

ship.table_description: The table records ships lost in battle with their details.

columns.caused_by_ship_id: The ship identifier responsible for the deaths.
columns.id: The unique identifier for each death entry.
columns.note: The location or context of the incident.
columns.killed: The number of people killed in the incident.
columns.injured: The number of people injured in the incident.

death.table_description: The table records incidents of death related to battles.
